data.text:
Going, Going ... Gone

Frances invites a bigwig of the art world to Sylvia's upcoming show, where more than just art piques his interest; Robert has concerns when Jackie suggests they start a business together.

The Deliverer

Xena joins forces with an old foe as she heads to Britannia to battle Caesar; Gabrielle follows a man named Krafstar, who she believes will teach her the ways of a peaceful religion.

The Bitter Suite

The conflict between Xena and Gabrielle reaches breaking point when the pair are transported to the dream world of Illusia to settle their differences.

Adventures In The Sin Trade

Xena sets out to retrieve the soul of Gabrielle, and her quest takes her to both Siberia and the Amazon land of the dead.
